title: COOLJOB 2 Pairs Thickened Rubber Gloves with Cotton Lining & Non-slip Grip, Colorful Household Long Lasting Dishwashing Gloves for Kitchen & Bathroom Cleaning, Orange & Blue, Small
features: Premium Quality Rubber Cleaning Gloves: Made from 100% thickened natural latex, these gloves offer exceptional wear resistance, stain-free performance, and odor-free protection. The soft latex ensures flexibility and comfort, providing long-lasting durability for all your household cleaning tasks.

Non-Slip Grip for Maximum Control: Featuring granules on the palms and fingers, these rubber gloves provide a reliable anti-slip grip, giving you full control in dry, damp, and wet conditions. Whether you're dishwashing, cleaning, or handling liquids, you can trust these gloves to keep your tasks secure and efficient.

Comfortable Soft Flocked Lining: Designed with a soft, absorbent flocked lining, these kitchen gloves ensure a comfortable fit even for extended wear. The lining absorbs moisture and sweat, keeping your hands dry, while the easy-on, easy-off design makes them convenient for everyday use.

Extended Cuffs for Extra Protection: The long, waterproof cuffs protect your forearms from water, cleaning agents, and grime, keeping your hands and arms clean and dry during tasks like dishwashing, laundry, and household cleaning.

Versatile & REACH Approved: These reusable cleaning gloves are perfect for a wide range of household chores, from dishwashing and laundry to gardening, pet care, and more. Available in full sizes to ensure a snug fit, these gloves protect your hands from harsh chemicals and keep your nails safe from drying or cracking.
description: Product Description Soft Flocked Cotton Liners Advanced Flocking cotton make it easy to wear or take off. Absorb moisture and sweat, keeping your hands comfy and dry. Anti-Slip Palm The granules in the palm and fingers provide a better grip and control. Ideal for handling small objects, like cutting in the kitchen, picking up trash and dishwashing. Durable and Long Cuff These upgraded gloves are designed to be thicker than before, comfortable for long time wearing. The cuff won't fall down when you do washing. The gloves are uneasy to be stained, they look like new after several uses. Perfect for Indoor and Outdoor Activities An ideal choice for washing clothes, washing dishes, bathroom cleaning, pet caring, cars or Pool Cleaning. Our gloves are not just for household cleaning, but also for outdoor like garden and yard. Previous page Next page 1 Washing Dishes 2 Cleaning Kitchen 3 Washing Clothes 4 Doing Daily Chores
